title: FS: SGC 60 and SGC 70 Sovereign 350’s - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: SGC 60 and SGC 70 Sovereign 350’s - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have these higher grade Sovereigns available for sale. Just shoot a PM if interested in any. Price listed is for no fee method and includes shipping....however I will entertain offers, especially if buying multiples.

$ Dooin SGC 60
$ Konetchy SGC 60
$ Wilson SGC 70
$ Heinie Smith SGC 70
